Review.Contenu: I like the GoFormz concept and the ease of having all our forms in one place for the techs to use. Building a form is relatively easy. More detailed training videos on the different elements of building forms would be helpful. I do not like how GoFormz sorts data. I don't find it easy to look for certain material. Also once you sort, if you go back a page it reverts to full display and ends the sorted detail. It is not easy to find older data that is often necessary for a service company.

Goformz is cheaper than other services I have used in Australian. Great & efficient on the computer when making and answering forms. Great for a businesses! The app is perfect to use for client based applications/ forms.
Rami was extremely helpful and informative.  It is because of the assistance like this we love working with Go Formz

The tech service fella was able to quickly diagnose my issue and get a resolution to solve my conflict.   Goformz tech support with Darren along with Samantha,  and Alexander, I am sure there are others, are great to work with and are consistently very quick to solve the issues that arise.  I am sure I am getting really good at pushing this system to the edge.  But this team is always ready to explore and solve any new issue I throw at them!

Review.Titre: Love it and have been using it since the…
Review.Contenu: Love it and have been using it since the beginning. Possible 9 to 10 years.

HOLY COW, what a relief to find Goformz! Super easy to use and an actual human for customer support.Crazy, right? It feels like they actually wanted my business.My goal was to go paperless for my roofing estimates. I went crazy trying every route. What I found with EVERY other company was either impossible to use or zero customer support or both. I was at the end of my rope when i stumbled onto these guys.I took a picture of my current estimate paper, tranfered it to Goformz and then dragged and dropped fillable fields into the areas that my salesmen would normally write. Yes, that simple. The fillable field have options for many different idea or just simply use the first field to drag and drop that is for a regular keyboard.I added a few pages and filled them with some info about my company and some pictures of completed jobs for color samples.Now my guys can measure the roof and email a beautiful proposal over from their smartphones.It is impressive and simple. Try it and you'll love it. Bring your company to the next level.Did I mention that I was a simple roofer?If I can use it so can you.
All my interactions with the GoFormz team is great. They all are very knowledgeable of the product.

GoFormz can be a bit tough to get ahold of somebody. But once I got through to our account manager Rami, he has always been there to help through whatever issue we are having. It is a fantastic tool that allows us to save an incredible number of labor hours every year. It frees up our people to do more of what they love and less of what they don't.

Review.Titre: Easy to use and great support
Review.Contenu: This was a new venture into setting up mobile forms for use by the field team. whilst evaluating the system their onboarding support was second to non and certainly instilled confidence. Being able to use existing paperwork in PDF format saved so much time. Once committed to the product you get transferred to the account management ream and this is when you really see the value in the depth of knowledge they have and the ability to simply resolve what you might see as a problem. Having built our first two forms its become apparent there is more we can do to make our customers experience great.

Review.Titre: Rami was very helpful in showing me how…
Review.Contenu: Rami was very helpful in showing me how to edit the template

We recently had to transfer all users to a new account, and Rami was instrumental in making this a smooth, and painless process. We have used GoFormz for several years and have received lots of feedback from our users at how user-friendly the app is.

We started using Goformz in 2017 when our work load out grew the use of paper. Goformz tech support is easy to use and quick to respond. Being able to customize just about everything has greatly increased our efficiency and responsiveness to clients.

I have worked with GoFormz for multiple years and they have a high quality of customer service, and the product is solid. Lots of customization. It has helped automate our processes and save us time and money.

Review.Titre: W shave been using GoFormz for a couple…
Review.Contenu: W shave been using GoFormz for a couple of years and have nothing but good things to say about them. They have always provided excellent support when needed. This app has really helped us stream line our processes.
As a non commercial user, I was having a problem understanding how to do a particular function. With the help of the Support Team, we were able to understand the problem and come up with a solution.

Love the concept of this site. It makes my job so much easier. Customer support has always been extremely helpful as well. Quick with their answers and always able to solve my issues quickly. I would highly recommend GoFormz !!

Review.Titre: I recently had the pleasure of using…
Review.Contenu: I recently had the pleasure of using GoFormz, and I couldn't be more impressed with the level of service and the user-friendly platform.Samantha, the representative who assisted me, was incredibly knowledgeable and helpful. She guided me through the features of the platform with patience and professionalism, addressing all my queries promptly. Her assistance made the process smooth and enjoyable.Thank you, Samantha, and the entire GoFormz team, for providing such an exceptional service. Looking forward to continued success with your platform!

Review.Titre: GoFormz had helped streamline our agriculture data collection forms!
Review.Contenu: This company has done great things for us. We greatly appreciate their friendly service and great product. Rami Mayuma has helped me each step of the way and even sent me some great merchandise when our last transaction was completed. We will be using this company for years if they maintain their level of service and quality product.

Guys, Can I provide comments later. We are totally happy with you. Your soft allowed us create a high standard laboratory reports that were recognised by the international standardization body. I can say more later, sorry busy now.

Review.Titre: We are so happy to have found GoFormz!!
Review.Contenu: We are so happy to have found GoFormz! The product is extremely user friendly, has endless features and the support has been amazing. Rami is awesome and patient, explaining everything and training us in all aspects. Highly recommend the company and program!!!

Had a great session with Rami, who demonstrated a few tips/tricks and opportunities to explore further in the tool.   As a fellow IT Consultant, it's a huge pleasure when we understand same language.   Thank You and look forward on working with you.

Ryan Lovelace has helped me put together some data collection forms which have been tremendously helpful.  There have been several challenges along the way, but Ryan always worked hard to help me resolve them with patience and encouragement.  I wish all customer support personnel were as he.
Having issues with log-in.Sorted quickly.
Knowing a representative will call back to correct an issue.
Everyone at GoFormz is amazng. Top notch service always!

Review.Titre: The entire process with GoFormz has…
Review.Contenu: The entire process with GoFormz has been a pleasure. The staff is extremely knowledgeable and friendly, we continue to learn new capabilities of the program every week. We are thrilled to have found such a comprehensive document program with unbeatable support.
My favorite solution for digital signatures. User friendly. Have use goformz since since 2018. Very pleased with the results.

Review.Titre: Rami was patient and took the time to…
Review.Contenu: Rami was patient and took the time to understand what my issue was. He then not only solved that one but showed me a way to make my form more presentable and easier to use.

Review.Titre: Goformz was one of our best choice
Review.Contenu: Goformz was one of our best choice. Moving to digital was easy and straight forward. Exatcly what i was looking for and how i imagine it.Thanks to the team. Really appreciate it! All the best!!
Account Representative was extremely helpful and well versed in product along with providing me assistance to setting up a new project... A+

Review.Titre: The GoFormz team, special Rami are a great support.
Review.Contenu: The GoFormz team, special Rami is prompt and they helping us to resolve the issues. Great communication, great help.
Adaptable to our business needs, always provide helpful and prompt advice and help when needed.
Support team very responsive and helpful!
Great customer service. I highly recommend GoFormz.
10/10 technical after sales back up. Goformz are great.Thanks Rami
Fast response to support issues with issues resolved
Used GoFormz for 10 years, customer service is exceptional. 100% recommend
